  • Method Details

    • validateAndShowErrors

      public static boolean validateAndShowErrors(Binder<?> binder)
      Validate the given Binder and display an error in an error notification on the screen if invalid.
      Parameters:
      binder - form binder
      Returns:
      true if valid, false if there were errors
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if binder is null

    • toBinderValidationStatus

      public static <T> BinderValidationStatus<T> toBinderValidationStatus(Binder<T> binder, ValidationException e)

      Parameters:
      message - main message
      details - extra message(s), or null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if message is null

    • notify

      public static void notify(NotificationVariant variant, Notification.Position position, int duration, String message, String... details)
      Show a notification.
      Parameters:
      variant - type of message
      position - position on screen
      duration - how long to stay on screen, or zero for infinity
      message - main message
      details - extra message(s), or null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter other than details is null
      IllegalStateException - if there is Vaadin UI associated with the current thread
